name: Caved In (codejet34)
description:
This game was made for the brackeys jam 2021.1!

This is caved in! A game about feeling alone and getting through it. Sadly I couldn't add sound effects because my computer I was using kept crashing when I tried to import my sound effects. SO... d:

This game was made with GDevelop so I could learn something new. Video on the game coming soon.

The Soundtrack


The font I used,
